      "Q": "What specific color palettes are applied to the girl’s clothing and hair, and what are the saturation ranges (e.g., 90–120%) for warm tones (e.g., magenta, yellow ochre) versus cool tones (e.g., cerulean, emerald) in these elements?",
      "DIMENSION": "COLOR_PALETTE",

      "WHY": "Pinpoints the technical execution that enables organic, fluid forms while maintaining expressive emotional depth",

      "WHY": "Links environmental form to narrative function and emotional resonance in the dreamlike cave setting",
